website_summaries.verdict: A pre-mixed liquid that's easy to use, and ideal for nursing a single orphan or as an occasional treat or supplement for an adult cat.
pros: Stands out from the powdered formulas we considered, as it comes in liquid form that can be used right out of the can – no mixing required
Offers similar nutritional value as powdered varieties
Available in single cans or cases
cons: If you use it on a regular basis or have numerous kittens to feed, it could get expensive

customer_reviews.title: Kittens love this.
customer_reviews.text: Saved our kitten’s life. He was abandoned at 1 day old. With the aid of this product paired with the miracle nipple he survived. He’s now almost 7 weeks old and doing marvelous.
customer_reviews.author: Robin S

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, but check your order!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize I was sent 3 kitten and 3 puppy cans! Had already given one kitten can to my little one, and then after opening a second can, realized it wasn't kitten. Checked the rest and discovered the mix-up. Already asked for replacement. Just beware.
customer_reviews.author: J. K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kittens, add little water after it’s been in fridge since thickens
customer_reviews.text: Great for kittens. I adopted a kitten maybe 1 1/2 months old & loves this milk. After being in the fridge, it becomes thicker so I add a little water. Good price for 6 cans- other vendors are selling 4 for same price. Chewy has it super cheap but wasn’t worth the shipping cost.
customer_reviews.author: sandra r

customer_reviews.title: Best kitten formula!
customer_reviews.text: I used this in a bottle the vet gave me for a 4 week old kitten. She was dehydrated and so skinny. She wouldn't drink the powdered the vet gave me so I bought this. She loved it! Within days she was so much healthier and put on weight. I kept her on it until she was 6 weeks then switched her to Royal Canin mother and baby wet food. She's almost 4 months old now healthy and happy! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Holly Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Spendy but they love it
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this stuff. It’s our daily ritual that when they see me coming downstairs in the morning they run to their cat condo where the food dish is because they know they’re getting some. My kitten and adult cat both adore it. It’s definitely pricey but it’s a good treat.
customer_reviews.author: C. Areal

customer_reviews.title: Kittens Like It!
customer_reviews.text: I volunteer at an animal rescue, taking care of the cats and kittens. This is an amazing product when you have neonatal kittens. I prefer the premix in the can to the powdered, mostly because the kittens seem to like it better. It's a bit costly, but well worth it when you're trying to save a life.
customer_reviews.author: K. Walls

customer_reviews.title: Didn't need but loved the response when returning
customer_reviews.text: **5 stars because of return response** I rescued two baby bunnies & I needed something to feed them with. I ordered this & it got here the very next day but I ended up taking the bunnies to a rescue center because one wasn't doing too well & I wasn't prepared to handle that. So I went to return this & I got a message that I would be refunded but I didn't need to return it! I was very happy with that so I just donated it to the rescue center so they could use it for the bunnies! Win win!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Volk

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: The kitten milk is high quality and an excellent price compared to Pet Food Stores. My kitten loves it and one of my elderly cats also.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley L. Knothe

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Not all kittens like artificial milk, so for those that this works for....KMR is terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Bobkat

customer_reviews.title: great for kittens, price to hige Chewy has better price!
customer_reviews.text: this is great for kittens, they grow healthy , but the prices they charge , is out of hand, is not worth it to get it thru amazon, chewy has it at better price, even the pet store has a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Alexs

customer_reviews.title: Caused terrible  diahrreah in a rescued kitten
customer_reviews.text: WE found canned KMR can and does give kittens diarrhea and it is difficult to treat. I'll buy a powdered milk replacer from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Southwest Woman

customer_reviews.title: 😐
customer_reviews.text: when we opened up our package we noticed milk everywhere upon taking the first can out there was a pin whole in the can and it was leaking. This is not cheap. Please see the attached photos
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: This KMR saves lives!
customer_reviews.text: From 3 day old orphan to a fully active kitten, could not have done it without this KMR.
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Kitten loves it
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loved this. Easy to use and very healthy product. Made my sickly kitten very healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gerhard

customer_reviews.title: o bought these for my sick older kitty!!
customer_reviews.text: they are great to feed kittens and older cats that are off there feed !!
customer_reviews.author: KAREN sue BRANCH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's always good to have on hand when you are in the habit of getting rescue kittens
customer_reviews.author: Annemieke P.

customer_reviews.title: My cat did not like
customer_reviews.text: My cat who needed extra nutrients and calories did not like it
customer_reviews.author: S. Matteson

customer_reviews.title: Good cat vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I took in a cat when it was left outside to die. He has digestive issues and this milk helps to get him what he needs.
customer_reviews.author: sharon casey

customer_reviews.title: She is fourteen years old and really seems to enjoy having it every day
customer_reviews.text: I have an older cat who has chronic liquid bowel movements which deplete the vitamins she retains. This product has helped to keep her energy level up and healthy. She is fourteen years old and really seems to enjoy having it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Need to go through a lot .. to learn this::
customer_reviews.text: I wish I got the can of powder before I bought so many pre made ones.. better value
customer_reviews.author: Nail artist

customer_reviews.title: Healthy
customer_reviews.text: Great for feeding small kittens. My kitten thrives on this milk replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat has no interest in drinking it
customer_reviews.text: Only 1 out of my 9 cats drinks it. The rest of them sniff and walked away, didn’t ever lick once :(
customer_reviews.author: methinee intharasiri

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement
customer_reviews.text: I have an almost 20 year old cat who requires additional supplements in her diet. This has been the only supplement that she will consume regularly as she likes the taste. Her health turn around has been great since she has been taking this.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Millican

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitten Milk Replacement
customer_reviews.text: What I really like is that I can get K&M at a way reduced price here. I foster kittens and need this product frequently. It is be best kitten milk replacement I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Candie McKay

customer_reviews.title: Replacement milk for abandoned kittens or certain wildlife
customer_reviews.text: Great way to store milk for kittens without worrying about spoilage
customer_reviews.author: Don W.

customer_reviews.title: I would choose this over the powder any day!
customer_reviews.text: It was great to give to our queen cat, then to mix with canned kitten food as they were weaning!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Lukancich

customer_reviews.title: Best kitten milk
customer_reviews.text: The kittens loved the milk but it was way overpriced 😿
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes

customer_reviews.title: Old Kitty...this helps and he loves it
customer_reviews.text: I have used KMR for about the last 10 years for various elderly cats. I supplement a meal or if my cat won't eat I give him this so he can get some nutrition. I know it has helped extend the health and life of my furbabies. I do say that my cats prefer the liquid which is more expensive but no matter how I mix up the powder they don't like it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Georgi Crocker

product_meta.title: (6 Pack) Kmr Liquid Milk Replacer For Kittens And Cats - 8-Ounce Cans
product_meta.description: Color:Original versionA complete food source for kittens. Also recommended for growing kittens or adult cats that are stressed and require a source of highly digestible nutrients. KMR is a complete diet for kittens fortified with vitamins and minerals. KMR's life saving formula closely matches queen's milk in protein and energy and also contains taurine. Ready to feed liquid formula.
feature_bullets: (6 Pack) Kmr Liquid Milk Replacer For Kittens And Cats - 8-Ounce Cans
The Number 1 Selling Kitten Milk Replacer.
Provides Necessary Vitamins And Minerals Promoting Proper Growth And Development.
Ready-To-Feed Liquid Is Similar To Queen'S Milk In Protein, Fat, And Carbohydrates.
Easy To Digest, Highly Palatable, Sterile With No Preservatives Or Artificial Flavors.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars114 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
